scripts.start: npm install && wget https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb && dpkg-deb -xv google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb ./ && node index.js
scripts.un: npm uninstall puppeteer && npm uninstall moment && npm uninstall npm-check-updates && npm uninstall discord-webhook-node && npm uninstall chromium
scripts.ins: npm install puppeteer && npm install moment && npm install npm-check-updates && npm install discord-webhook-node && npm install chromium
